message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $12,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I'm confident in the value this product brings. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9,500?
